mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, EMP_NAME AS empName, EMP_REGNO AS empRegno, EMP_ENABLE AS empEnable, REQ_SEQ_NO AS reqSeqNo, COOP_ORG_NO AS coopOrgNo FROM ATMS_04001120
SELECT TX_ID AS txId, EMP_NAME AS empName, EMP_REGNO AS empRegno, EMP_ENABLE AS empEnable, REQ_SEQ_NO AS reqSeqNo, COOP_ORG_NO AS coopOrgNo FROM ATMS_04001120 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_04001120 SET EMP_NAME = #{empName}, EMP_REGNO = #{empRegno}, EMP_ENABLE = #{empEnable}, REQ_SEQ_NO = #{reqSeqNo}, COOP_ORG_NO = #{coopOrgNo} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}
INSERT INTO ATMS_04001120 ( TX_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_REGNO, EMP_ENABLE, REQ_SEQ_NO, COOP_ORG_NO ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{empName}, #{empRegno}, #{empEnable}, #{reqSeqNo}, #{coopOrgNo} )
